title: How to disassemble .mbn files?
content: I can't disassemble .mbn files using ida pro 7+ if I use some scripts from GitHub than I can't disassemble any function, any help ? I want to reverse qcom bootloader

comments.text: You're referring to the Sony Ericsson phone firmware? Can you provide some additional detail on where the files came from and what scripts you are trying to use?
Nope, all qcom bootloader is same. mbn files and script
